notes:
This creature only exists on certain [[Test Server]]s and it's created by [[CipSoft]] Members.

sounds: Does your mother know what you are doing?
history: On the first time these creatures were seen, they didn't take characters' life and they were mortal creatures. However, this was changed and they became immune to every attack and were so strong that they killed everyone with a single hit. One of the times they were seen was the test server for the [[Updates/8.4|Winter Update 2008]].
name: Gamemaster (Creature)
behaviour: Kills everyone in its path. It's not a description, but a fact.
strategy: You can't kill it, the best strategy is to '''run'''.
